text:
To fly on solar power, 
it takes very very low mass.

If you get rid of everything else,
what’s left is the thing you really need:
a wing, and propulsion.
But until it’s actually airborne,
it’s hard to tell that all of it will work.
This is it… we have to, we have to go.
So, remove the safety straps and, go fly.

- Copy, we are ready for launch.
- Good luck.
All stations, launching in 3… 2… 1…
[RADIO] Full throttle!
This thing has the wingspan of an airliner
and is gonna fly on roughly the power of three blowdryers.

- [RADIO] We have lift off!
- [RADIO] Lift off detected.
[RADIO] And we’re climbing.
Congrats!
Look at it! It’s just hovering there.
That’s what it’s designed to do though, isn’t it!
[RADIO] Aircraft looks stable.
We’re getting excellent auto-pilot performance.
It’s behaving exactly as modeled.
